Pre-Game Insights: Poland were the first side to be officially eliminated from Euro 2024 after losing their opening two matches.France have not won their final group-stage fixture in any tournament since beating Togo 2-0 at the 2006 World Cup.France have not lost a single group game at the Euros under Deschamps, a streak which has lasted eight matches.France have not suffered a single defeat to Poland since 1982, a streak which has lasted eight contests.Poland are bidding to avoid losing every game in a European Championship group stage for the first time in their history.
